document_data.name: Ulyoon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ulyoon''' were a tribe of [[Nar (ethnicity)|Nars]] inhabiting the town of [[Peltarch]] in western [[Narfell]].
document_data.Organization: The tribe numbered more than a 1000 members<ref group="note">''[[Forgotten Realms Campaign Guide]]'' states that most of the Nars of Peltarch are of the Ulyoon tribe, and as 2000 tribesmen live in the town, at least, and probably far more, must be part of this tribe. ''circa'' {{Yearlink|1479}}.
document_data.Activities: The Ulyoon were avid fishermen and traders and welcomed caravans all throughout the year, receiving several each winter when the [[Icelace Lake]] froze over and the easiest route to [[Damara]] went over the ice instead of through the [[Giantspire Gap]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The Ulyoon lived primarily in Peltarch, and fished the bountiful waters of the Icelace lake.
document_data.Relationships: The trade and contact with foreigners made them both tolerant and even welcome of outlanders, and quite wealthy compared to other Nar tribes. The other tribes in turn viewed the Ulyoon as outlanders instead of fellow Nars, and blamed encounters with very aggressive wildlife, especially [[Cave bear|cave]] and [[Dire bear|dire bears]], and dark spirits on the mingling of ancient and modern traditions in the town.
